title: Pool Party Rek'Sai Recall
body: I recently purchased the coveted Pool Party Rek'Sai skin. After watching a skin preview on the skin spotlights youtube channel, I came to the conclusion that when in game the animation for the recall is buggy. Playing with the skin, as soon as I begin the recall animation it appears fine with the frog spawning and Rek'Sai circling it. However, as soon as the animation moves for Rek'Sai to jump and eat the frog, this specific animation never actually occurs. Instead, he just gets spawned into the middle where the frog was. I am sure this is a bug that I am not only experiencing.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Have you rested it with the new patch? This issue should be resolved with patch 5.13.
Yes, I did actually reset it with the new patch. However, it still hasn't resolved the issue.
I just loaded in on live, and had no issues with the recall - she completed her animation by jumping up and eating the frog.
I've noticed that this bug only occurs after you rank up her Unburrow. Before then, the recall works fine.

This was an issue when she was first released - patch 5.12. This issue should be resolved in patch 5.13 (current patch). 

I just checked on live under the conditions you mentioned above, and has no issues. :3 Let me know if you're still having an issue with the recall!
